name: Purgo box
description:
This game is an online multiplayer game created in RPG Tutool.
Collect items, increase the heroine's sensitivity, and aim for the ending.

Play time
3 hours or more

Number of endings
13 types

Operation Description
Keyboard

Cross-keys Movement
1 to 9 Emotion
C Chat
M Play/Stop Music
O/P Housing System ON/OFF
I Use housing items

Mouse
Click Move/Examine

Some parts of the translation have not been completed.
